sql.value: select partner_account.partnerName, ifnull(clientInfo.clientCount,0) as clientCount, ifnull(clientInfo.applyTotal,0) as applyTotal, ifnull(useCoupon.couponUse,0) as couponUse, ifnull(bonusTotalInfo.bonusTotal,0) as bonusTotal, ifnull(bonusHadInfo.bonusHad,0) as bonusHad from ( select id,partnerName,mobilePhone,referralName,referralPhone,agentName,agentPhone,state from partner_account where state = 1 )partner_account left join ( select applierId, count(applierId) clientCount, sum(applyNum) applyTotal from partner_coupon_apply where state = 1 group by applierId )clientInfo on partner_account.id = clientInfo.applierId left join ( select applierId,count(id) couponUse from partner_coupon where state = 1 group by applierId )useCoupon on partner_account.id = useCoupon.applierId left join ( select accountId,sum(wallet) bonusTotal from partner_wallet_detail where type = 1 group by accountId )bonusTotalInfo on partner_account.id = bonusTotalInfo.accountId left join ( select accountId,sum(wallet) bonusHad from partner_wallet_detail where type = -1 group by accountId )bonusHadInfo on partner_account.id = bonusHadInfo.accountId
